import React, { useState } from "react"; import './Loyalty.css'; const loyaltyUrl = "http://localhost:8000/loyalty/" const Loyalty = () => { const [loyalty, setLoyalty] = useState([]); const getLoyalty = async () => { const response = await fetch(loyaltyUrl); const json = await response.json(); setLoyalty(json); } return ( <>

Loyal Customers

Defined as those customers who have visited any park globally 3 or more times

{loyalty.map(l => ( ))}
Guest # Guest Name # of Visits Globally
{l.guest_id} {l.name} {l.visits}

Globalist Customers

Defined as those customers who have travelled to each one of our parks globally

{loyalty.map(l => ( ))}
Guest # Guest Name # of Visits Globally
{l.guest_id} {l.name} {l.visits}
) }; export default Loyalty;
